issues.title: Infrastructure Investment
issues.description: Strong supporter of transportation and infrastructure funding, particularly for Northwest Washington's transportation networks

issues.title: Aerospace and Manufacturing Support
issues.description: Advocates for Boeing and aerospace industry jobs, supports manufacturing tax credits and workforce development

issues.title: Climate Change Mitigation
issues.description: Supports clean energy initiatives, carbon reduction policies, and investments in renewable energy infrastructure

issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Supports expanding affordable healthcare, protecting pre-existing condition coverage, and lowering prescription drug costs

issues.title: Veterans Support
issues.description: Advocates for improved veterans' healthcare, mental health services, and job training programs

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal funding for public education, student loan reform, and workforce training programs

issues.title: Trade Policy
issues.description: Supports fair trade agreements that protect American workers and maintain strong international economic relationships
